Posts.Content: May 7, 2018 08:47PM Coltsgirl312 wrote: Hi!! I am scheduled on May 15th for my double mastectomy, with no reconstruction, so we can go through this together! I'm out in Oregon and wishing you the best. Won't know my staging or treatment plans until they do the sentinel node biopsy during surgery, which is hard. I don't know if my journey is ending or beginning. Which, honestly is one of the hardest parts so far. I don't know what my treatment looks like. Are any of you in the same boat? Is this common? Thanks!
Posts.Title: May 2018 Surgery Support Group ReadyAbout SPDGirl
